thread.section_title: Accademia Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location and value
thread.title_full: Great location and value - Review of Accademia Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Boteswaine
title: Great location and value
text: I will certainly return for a third visit to Accedmia. We got a room at the Club level, where you get a luxury experience, including separate breakfast and around-the-clock coffe and snacks. There is even a separate entrance. The room was squeeky clean and the bed very comfortable. We even had a balcony of our own. You find the Trevi fountain 60 meters away, yet our room was very quiet.
